nodes.text: "Green Squad 3" was an article in Challenge 57 written by Stephen A. Marinaccio and published in February 1992. It focuses on Green Squad 3.

Green Squad 3 was training at ATC-5/GS. When running a simulation under the guidance of Bret Hanson. During the simluation, while trying to capture the datafile Green3, it is interrupted by an attack by the Empire.
